title: Instructor
name: Luis Ribeiro
description: Luis Ribeiro is a globally recognised medical practitioner whose dedication to health and healing has established his reputation in the field for nearly two decades. As the Founder and Clinical Director of Club Health, his background as a professional footballer and football Physiotherapist has deeply informed his holistic approach to wellness. Luis is driven by a clear goal: to deliver simple, authentic care that addresses the root causes of health issues, steering clear of invasive treatments and unnecessary medications.
